meta.title: Rockefeller Center Concourse Map & Directions
meta.description: Easily find your way at Rockefeller Center and the Concourse. Use our Map & Directions for finding attractions, concourse restaurants, entrances, restrooms, and more.

directionHero.title: Everything leads to the Center.
directionHero.bodyCopy: Rockefeller Center is located in midtown Manhattan, between 48th and 51st Streets and Fifth and Sixth Avenues. Map your route below.

routes.name: B D F M Trains
routes.directions: Take the B, D, F, or M train to the 47-50th Street Rockefeller Center stop.

routes.name: 1 Train
routes.directions: Take the 1 train to the 50th Street stop and walk East on 50th Street to Rockefeller Center between Fifth and Sixth Avenues.

routes.name: 6 Train
routes.directions: Take the 6 train to the 51st Street stop and walk West on 50th Street to Rockefeller Center between Fifth and Sixth Avenues.

routes.name: N Q R Trains
routes.directions: Take the N, Q, or R train to the 49th Street stop and walk East on 49th Street to Rockefeller Center between Fifth and Sixth Avenues.

routes.name: Fifth Avenue (Going South) or Madison Avenue (Going North)
routes.directions: Take the M1, M2, M3, M4 or M5 bus to 50th Street. Buses run north and south.

routes.name: From Broadway
routes.directions: Take the M7 bus. Exit at 50th Street and walk east to Rockefeller Center. Buses run north and south.

routes.name: From 49th Street
routes.directions: Take the M50 bus. Exit anywhere between Fifth Avenue and Sixth Avenue. Buses run east and west.

directionCitiBikeGrid.title: Citi Bike
directionCitiBikeGrid.description: Citibike is NYC's official bike sharing system and is a fun, easy, affordable way to explore the city. You can get a day pass or annual membership and dock at Rockefeller Center on 51st Street or 48th Street between Fifth and Sixth Avenues. Learn more and sign up for Citibike here. https://www.citibikenyc.com/

crossLinks.title: Community
crossLinks.caption: Each day is an opportunity to celebrate the diverse and vibrant people who make Rockefeller Center great––including you.

crossLinks.title: Culture
crossLinks.caption: Experience the best of New York’s art and entertainment in an atmosphere where community and creativity collide.
